DOC.brief_summary: This trial test impact culturally tailor theory driven primary intimate partner violence prevention intervention Spanish speaking Latino men .
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize controlled trial , Spanish speaking Latino men recruit community church setting Southwest Detroit randomly assign : ( ) intimate partner violence prevention intervention ( b ) wait-list control condition . Latino men assign intervention receive , small group set , 8-session , primary intimate partner violence prevention intervention base Duluth model culturally linguistically tailored Spanish speaking Latino men . Measures administer pre-test , three six month post-intervention .
DOC.criteria: Spanish speaking Latino men age 18 55 stable relationship least past three month severely mentally impaired hearing impair
